resources.string: Krill is licensed under the BSD 2-clause free software license. The source code is freely available on my GitHub. https://github.com/benjif
Krill was made using Kotlin and AndroidX as my first foray into android development. As such, features will be sparse at first.
Smooth in-app comment section viewing is the highest priority, as well as UI smoothness in general. Logging in, voting, and commenting follows.
